description.value:
You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

Add the draconic bloodline's granted spells to your spell list; you must still learn them or add them to your repertoire as normal. These spells are @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]{Resist Energy}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Chromatic Wall]{Chromatic Wall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Form]{Dragon Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mask of Terror]{Mask of Terror}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Prismatic Wall]{Prismatic Wall}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Overwhelming Presence]{Overwhelming Presence}.

value: ability to cast spells from spell slots
